Thanks for the fix.  I committed the change on the heritrix-1_10_0 
branch (HEAD shouldn't be on maven 1.0.x for very much longer).
St.Ack

bergmark_d wrote:
>
> Maven 1.0.2 was refusing to build heritrix 1.10.0
> for me. There was a problem downloading dependencies.
> The workaround can be found at
> http://maven.apache.org/maven-1.x/news.html. 
> <http://maven.apache.org/maven-1.x/news.html.>
>
> You need to add this line to the project.properties
> file that you have in the heritrix-1.10.0/ directory:
>
> maven.repo.remote=http://repo1.maven.org/maven 
> <http://repo1.maven.org/maven>
>
> That fix worked for me and heritrix 1.10.0 built.
>
> Maybe the IA folks would like to add this line
> (temporarily, I'm sure) to their project.properties
> file.
>
> D. Bergmark
>
>
